description: This template will be used to notify Admins when Students send their final status.
name: Course Enrollment Confirmation

subject.en_US: The student [%USERTOMYCOURSEENROLLMENT_USER_GIVENNAME%] [%USERTOMYCOURSEENROLLMENT_USER_FAMILYNAME%] has updated his status to [%MYCOURSEENROLLMENT_ENROLLMENTSTATUS%] for the session [%MYCOURSESESSIONTOMYCOURSEENROLLMENT_MYCOURSESESSION_TITLE%] of the Course [%MYCOURSESESSIONTOMYCOURSEENROLLMENT_MYCOURSESESSION_R_MYCOURSETOMYCOURSESESSION_C_MYCOURSEID%]
